Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.servercontroller.controllerstates

Class WaitingForSavedGameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.servercontroller.controllerstates.WaitingForSavedGameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameState
public class WaitingForSavedGameState extends Object implements GameState
after ServerInitState, the controller enters this state if the first player's nickname is found in the saved game
